org.contentmine.image.colour

Class RGBColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.image.colour.RGBColor

  • public class RGBColor
extends java.lang.Object
    enforces all RGB values to be 24-bit i.e. removes alpha channel also allows easier indexing in maps and diffing and String values
    Author:
    pm286

      • absDiff

        public java.lang.Integer absDiff(RGBColor jj,
                                 int maxStep)
        gets absolute diff between two colours. returns setRGB( abs(ii.getRed()-jj.getRed()), abs(ii.getGreen()-jj.getGreen()), abs(ii.getBlue()-jj.getBlue()) ); The result is NOT a colour but has RGB structure
        Parameters:
        ii -
        jj -
        Returns:
        abs(ii.getRed()
